descriptionHtml:
[size=30][b][center][color=black] NIANP [/color][/center][/size][/b]
[size=17][b][center]New Items And Powers [/center][/size][/b]

[size=10][b][center][color=black] Description[/color] [/size][/b][/center]


[size=5][b]
* Every Stone have unique and awesome powers

* For now it adds a [color=red]YOL[/color] power located at sier\'s house (near rorikstead)

* Powers last up to 5 min / 1 cast per day

* Its a Stone Power (like serpent stone etc), If you choose my stone your normal Stone power will deactivate.

 * added a rare ingredient that can be bought from sier
[/size][/b]

[size=10][b][center][color=black] Fact [/color] [/size][/b][/center]

[size=6][b]There are 6 Legendary People who built the stone [/size][/b]

[size=5][b]
[color=red] Sier = YoL Stone[/color]
 [color=black]Unknown = Krah Stone(still on progress)
 Unknown = iiz Stone(still on progress)
 Unknown = Aus Stone(still on progress)
 Unknown = Zii Stone(still on progress)
 Unknown = Dur Stone(still on progress)[/color]
[/size][/b]

[size=10][b][center][color=black] Versions[/color] [/size][/b][/center]
[size=5][b]
[color=black]Version .75[/color]  : Added [color=red]YoL[/color] power and rare ingredients 
[/size][/b]

[size=10][b][center][color=black]Compability[/color] [/size][/b][/center]
[size=5][b]
 Still don\"t know, but if you find one please tell me
[/size][/b]

[size=7][b][center][color=black]Requirements[/color] [/size][/b][/center]
[size=5][b]
Higher Version of skyrim[/size][/b]
 
[size=6][b][center][color=black]Credits[/color][/size][/b][/center]

[size=5][b]
 Bethesda/skyrim , Dheuster(for helping me out)[/size][/b]

[size=6][b][center][color=black]heeeelp[/color][/size][/b][/center]
[size=5][b]
 Feel free to comment if something wrong about with my mod :)[/size][/b]

[size=3][b][color=yellow]Abram[/size][/color][/b]
author: Abram1
